Title: "Optimizing Phone Number Search in Azure: A Tutorial"

action": "upload",          "id": "6",        "phone_number": "13215550199"      },      {        "@search.action": "upload",          "id": "7",        "phone_number": "425 555 0100"      },      {        "@search.action": "upload",          "id": "8",        "phone_number": "321.555.0199"      }    ]    }SearchGET https://<YOUR-SEARCH-SERVICE-NAME>.search.windows.
net/indexes/tutorial-basic-index/docs?api-version=2019-05-06&search=(425) 555-0100  Content-Type: application/json  api-key: <YOUR-ADMIN-API-KEY>  This query returns three out of four expected results but also returns two unexpectedresults:JSONNext, let's search a number without any formatting 4255550100HTTPThis query does even worse, only returning one of four correct matches.
